item.title: CDPR：switch版《巫师3》让公司收入大幅增加[100-150]
item.description:
CDPR：switch版《巫师3》让公司收入大幅增加 本帖最后由 ywll 于 2019-11-24 17:42 编辑
CDPR 副经理兼CFO Nielubowicz 说：第三季度营收超过去年同期愈 38 %，Switch 版《巫师3》销售增幅居功至伟，正面的反馈让整个公司大受鼓舞。
Our third-quarter revenues were over 38% higher than during the corresponding period in 2018. This is due, among others, to increased sales of The Witcher 3, first shipments of the game’s Nintendo Switch edition and an increase in revenues posted by GOG.com.

item.title: CDPR：switch版《巫师3》让公司收入大幅增加[0-50]
item.description:
CDPR：switch版《巫师3》让公司收入大幅增加 本帖最后由 ywll 于 2019-11-24 17:42 编辑
CDPR 副经理兼CFO Nielubowicz 说：第三季度营收超过去年同期愈 38 %，Switch 版《巫师3》销售增幅居功至伟，正面的反馈让整个公司大受鼓舞。
Our third-quarter revenues were over 38% higher than during the corresponding period in 2018. This is due, among others, to increased sales of The Witcher 3, first shipments of the game’s Nintendo Switch edition and an increase in revenues posted by GOG.com.
